name: Light Way (MXT Games)
description:
Small puzzle game was made for Weekly Game Jam #100 in less than 8 hours total.

Guide your hero through maze and collect all sparks to get 100 ponts. Your hero will grow each time you collect sparks. Be carefull not to hit walls. Reveal map with light. Complete all 5 levels.

Sound by: Guitarz1970

Thanks for playing! 😃
